subject: Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
body:
Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
845 3rd Ave 8th Floor
New York, NY 10022
United States
For Your Attention Sir,  
 
REVIEW / PAYMENT OF YOUR FUNDS
This email notification is coming to you on the instruction of the International Finance Corporation (IFC) Headquarters here in New York. Please read attentively, my name is Suzzie Jenkins Fitzgerald, a former director of finance at the International Monetary Fund (IMF) between June 2010 to Sept 2019 and presently working as a private consultant on fiscal and monetary policies to the International Finance Corporation (IFC) at its headquarters in New York, where I am handling  the on-going verification of this fund disbursement project.
My firm Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc. is the lead consultant to the International Finance Corporation (IFC) and was handed the responsibilities to review past and present financial transactions that were either abandoned, inconclusive or mishandled by some unauthorized persons. We shall carefully scrutinize all payment files,identify genuine beneficiaries and make necessary recommendations to the IFC Headquarters for approval of payment and subsequent disbursement of approved funds to the beneficiary
We are therefore contacting you because from the records available to us  you are listed as one of the fund beneficiaries with $15.2 million dollars unpaid funds which were previously mishandled by some impersonators who had tried to take advantage of you . Please kindly confirm your legitimacy as a beneficiary and your readiness to work with us in resolving the issues around your payment by responding immediately to this message.
Sincerely,
Suzzie J. Fitzgerald
Principal Partner - FITZGERALD & COPPERLAND INC., USA
On behalf of: International Finance Corporation (IFC)

subject: Re:   Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
body:
Hello Suzzie J. Fitzgerald,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the review of payment for my funds. I appreciate your firm, Fitzgerald Copperland Inc., taking on this responsibility and working towards resolving any issues surrounding my unpaid funds.

I would like to confirm my legitimacy as a fund recipient and express my readiness to work with you in resolving these matters. Could you please provide me with more details about the specific steps that need to be taken in order to proceed with the review and subsequent approval of payment?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Vera

subject: Re: Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
body:
Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
845 3rd Ave 8th Floor
New York, NY 10022
United States
Tel:  +1 (347) 431-5205
Fax: +1 (716) 300-6455

Dear* Ms Vera, *

We received your quick response to your email regarding the review of your
unpaid $15.2 million dollar funds. However, before we proceed, it is
important to emphasize, for the avoidance of doubt, that this disbursement
project is funded by the International Finance Corporation (IFC) in
collaboration with the IMF and the humanitarian office of the World Bank.
Our job as a private financial consultant in this project is to verify your
details and process your payment files and then make necessary
recommendations to the IFC head office for payment approval.

Now, in order to begin the payment process, you are required to provide us
with your following details:

1.  Names and Address
2.  Nationality,
3.  Age or Date of Birth
4.  Contact Telephone Number,
5.  Occupation
6.  Scan Copy of your Valid ID

This information is necessary to open a file in your name and register your
details in the central database that will be used to process your payment.
Your payment file will then be presented to the board of directors of the
International Finance Corporation (IFC) for final approval of your payment.
Please note that approved funds will be disbursed to you through the
designated bank JPMorgan Chase, either via direct wire transfer to the
beneficiary's designated bank account or via certified bank transfer.

We look forward to receiving the required information from you as soon as
possible, so that we can proceed. Attached is a scanned copy of my driver's
license ID for identification purposes.

Sincerely,

*Suzzie J. Fitzgerald*
Principal Partner: FITZGERALD & COPPERLAND INC., USA
On behalf of: International Finance Corporation - IFC

subject: Re: Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
body:
Dear Ms. Suzzie J. Fitzgerald,

Thank you for your prompt response and providing me with the necessary information regarding the review of my unpaid million dollar funds. I appreciate your clarification about the project being funded by the Finance IFC in collaboration with the IMF and the office of the World Bank.

Before I proceed, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure that everything is in order. Firstly, could you please explain to me how my details will be verified and processed? What specific steps are involved in this process?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the central database where my details will be registered. How secure is this database? Are there any measures in place to protect my personal information?

Furthermore, could you provide me with more information about Chase bank? Is it a reputable financial institution? How can I be assured that my funds will be safely transferred through them?

Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned either direct wire transfer or certified bank transfer as options for disbursing approved funds. Could you please explain the difference between these two methods? Which one do you recommend?

I apologize for bombarding you with questions, but it's important for me to have a clear understanding of the process before proceeding further. Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Vera

subject: Re: Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
body:
Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
845 3rd Ave 8th Floor
New York, NY 10022
United States
Tel:  +1 (347) 431-5205
Fax: +1 (716) 300-6455

Dear* Ms Vera,*

We acknowledge receipt of your message and we appreciate your questions
which we will gladly provide answers to. First concerning your details, it
is necessary that you provide your full details to enable us open a file in
your name and then we would process your payment based on the details you
submitted, your details are also required in order for us to ascertain that
you are the legitimate beneficiary and not an impostor.

The central database is a systems based platform where official information
and other details are inputted in an electronic file for reference
purposes, it is a highly secured system platform well protected by firewall
application, all personal information collated from beneficiaries as well
as official information are 100% secured and protected by the firewall app
and are used strictly for the purpose it was collated which is to process
your payment.

Lastly, Chase bank needs no introduction. It is a respectable, reliable and
well recognized financial institution in the United States, who has been in
operation in the United States, Canada and the UK over a decade. So there
is no question about the integrity and the credibility of Chase bank and
their capacity to handle the assignment.

Finally, direct wire transfer means that the approved amount will be
disbursed to you through bank transfer from the designated bank which is
Chase bank and directly into your own bank account which you are expected
to provide as we make progress,  while certified bank draft is a monetary
instrument that will be issued to you inform of a cashier check and
delivered to your address via courier (DHL or Fedex)  and then you will
deposit the check into your bank account and it will clear into cash in 5
to 7 working days, another option of payment is issuing ATM debit cards
which we are you must be familiar with. So these are the 3 options to
release the funds to you after approval is granted by the board of
directors. Hope this answers your questions.

Thank you.

*Suzzie J. Fitzgerald*
Principal Partner: FITZGERALD & COPPERLAND INC., USA
On behalf of: International Finance Corporation - IFC

subject: Re: Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
body:
Dear Ms. Vera,

Thank you for reaching out to Fitzgerald Copperland Inc. We appreciate your questions and are happy to provide you with the information you need. In order to proceed, we kindly request that you provide us with your full details so that we can open a file in your name and process your payment accordingly. This is necessary to ensure that we are dealing with the legitimate recipient and not an impostor.

Our central database is a highly secure platform where official and personal details are stored for reference purposes. It is protected by a firewall application, ensuring the confidentiality of all information collected. Rest assured that any data provided will be used solely for the purpose of processing your payment.

Regarding Chase bank, it is a reliable and well-recognized financial institution in the United States, Canada, and the UK. With over a decade of operation, there is no doubt about their integrity and capacity to handle financial transactions.

When it comes to payment options, we offer direct wire transfer, which involves transferring the approved amount directly into your own bank account through Chase bank. Alternatively, we can issue a certified bank draft in the form of a cashier's check and deliver it to your address via courier services such as DHL or FedEx. You would then deposit the check into your bank account, which will clear within 2 working days. Another option available is issuing an ATM debit card if you are familiar with this method.

I hope this answers your questions satisfactorily. If you have any further inquiries or require additional clarification, please feel free to ask.

Thank you once again for contacting us.

Sincerely,
Suzzie J.

Best wishes,
Vera

subject: Re: Fitzgerald & Copperland Inc.
body:
Dear Ms. Vera,

Thank you for reaching out to Fitzgerald Copperland Inc. We appreciate your questions and are happy to provide you with the information you need. In order to proceed, we kindly request that you provide us with your full details so that we can open a file in your name and process your payment accordingly. This is necessary to ensure that we are dealing with the legitimate recipient and not an impostor.

Our central database is a highly secure platform where official and personal details are stored for reference purposes. It is protected by a firewall application, ensuring the confidentiality of all information collected. Rest assured that any data provided will be used solely for the purpose of processing your payment.

Regarding Chase bank, it is a reputable financial institution that has been operating in the United States, Canada, and the UK for over a decade. There is no doubt about their integrity and capacity to handle financial transactions.

When it comes to the disbursement of funds, we offer three options: direct wire transfer, certified bank draft (cashier's check), or issuance of an ATM debit card. With direct wire transfer, the approved amount will be transferred from our designated bank (Chase bank) directly into your own bank account. Alternatively, we can issue a certified bank draft which will be delivered to your address via courier service (DHL or FedEx). You can deposit this check into your bank account, and it will clear within 2 working days. The third option involves issuing an ATM debit card which I'm sure you're familiar with.

I hope this answers your questions satisfactorily. If you have any further inquiries or require additional clarification, please feel free to ask.

Thank you,
Suzzie J.

Best wishes,
Vera
